SELECT b.ORGNZT_NM, a.ESNTL_ID, a.USER_NM, a.EMPL_NO, a.OFCPS_NM FROM COMTNEMPLYRINFO a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNORGNZTINFO b ON a.ORGNZT_ID = b.ORGNZT_ID WHERE 1=1
AND binary(IFNULL(b.ORGNZT_NM, ' ')) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWrd}, '%')
AND binary(IFNULL(a.USER_NM, ' ')) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWrd}, '%')
ORDER BY b.ORGNZT_NM, a.USER_NM ASC LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

SELECT COUNT(EMPLYR_ID) as cnt FROM COMTNEMPLYRINFO a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNORGNZTINFO b ON a.ORGNZT_ID = b.ORGNZT_ID WHERE 1=1
AND binary(IFNULL(b.ORGNZT_NM, ' ')) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWrd}, '%')
AND binary(IFNULL(a.USER_NM, ' ')) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWrd}, '%')

SELECT A.INFRML_SANCTN_ID, A.JOB_SE_CODE, B.CODE_NM JOB_SE_NM, A.APPLCNT_ID, C.USER_NM APPLCNT_NM, A.REQST_DE, A.SANCTNER_ID, D.USER_NM SANCTNER_NM, E.ORGNZT_NM SANCTNER_ORGNZT_NM, A.CONFM_AT, A.SANCTN_DT, A.RETURN_RESN FROM COMTNINFRMLSANCTN A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE B ON B.CODE_ID = 'COM075' AND A.JOB_SE_CODE = B.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNEMPLYRINFO C ON A.APPLCNT_ID = C.ESNTL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNEMPLYRINFO D ON A.SANCTNER_ID = D.ESNTL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNORGNZTINFO E ON D.ORGNZT_ID = E.ORGNZT_ID WHERE A.INFRML_SANCTN_ID = #{infrmlSanctnId}
mapper.update: UPDATE COMTNINFRMLSANCTN SET CONFM_AT = #{confmAt}, SANCTN_DT = sysdate(), RETURN_RESN = #{returnResn}, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = sysdate(), LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #{lastUpdusrId} WHERE INFRML_SANCTN_ID = #{infrmlSanctnId}
